title: Easy Pot Pie with Pie Crust

Ingredients.1: 3 small potatoes, peeled and cut into small pieces

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain and season potatoes with salt.

Directions.3: Combine cooked potatoes, gravy, peas and carrots, and chicken in a bowl.

Directions.4: Press 1 crust into a 9-inch pie pan. Pour potato mixture into crust and cover with second crust. Pinch edges to close pie, and trim off any excess from edges. Make a small cut in the center of the crust. Brush the top with beaten egg.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 35 minutes.
